Disco Tray Studios

Infusing unexpected joy and wonder into community-focused software

Our Mission

Disco Tray Studios is a community-focused software development initiative at Hendrix College in Conway, Arkansas. We are five students led by Professor of Computer Science, Dr. Mark Goadrich. This project aims to empower students in developing interactive educational games for social good and provide opportunities for student to execute and complete longer-term software development projects that support the technological needs of the local community.

Our Projects

My Life In Months

My Life in Months is a website that allows you to make a chart of your life throughout the months.

Hendrix Assesment

A website for all Hendrix professors to assess how many students met certain learning goals at the end of the semeter.

Timeline

  • July 2020 - Founded

    Dr. Goadrich got funding to hire 5 students for the school year

  • September 2020 - My Life In Months Completed

    A website where you can document your life throughout the months

  • October 2020 - Hendrix Assessment Started

    A website for all Hendrix professors to assess how many students met certain learning goals at the end of the semeter.

  • November 2020 - We Started Streaming!

    We created a Twitch account to review educational games

Let's Get In Touch!

Ready to start your next project with us? Send us an email and we will get back to you as soon as possible!
